summary: Say \"HELLO!\" to the new and improved Benor!
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------
DESCRIPTION
----------------------------------
Ever wonder why Bethesda made Benor look like he has down syndrome? Isn\'t he supposed to be the \"best\" fighter in Morthal? Time to change that.
With this modification, you can say \'Hello!\' to a real, tough follower.

----------------------------------
WHAT DOES IT DO?
----------------------------------
This mod only edits Benor\'s face mesh, sets him to be essential (won\'t die), and makes him a tad-bit taller.
Nothing more.

----------------------------------
COMPATIBILITY
----------------------------------
Because this is only a mesh-changing modification, I doubt there will be any conflicts, unless you already have a custom mesh for Benor. I AM using the \'Better Males\' mod, however. Further testing needs to be done to check if this mod disrupts others.
author: Diego
